text:
1. i install apache server version 2.0.59 on windows XP Machine. when i start,
restart or shutdown apache services it comes with error

"<OS 2> The system cannot find the file specified : No installed service names
APACHE2"

2. I also cant find file name "httpd.exe" in sub folder name "bin" under main
"apache " folder. please also tell me why i cant find this file in this folder
in fact i cant found this file under any folder in apache.

please work on both error and tell me why happen and how to resolve it.
creator: azeem_agha@hotmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
sorry - but support questions belong on the user list, bugzilla isn't a support
forum.

you might start reading the 2.0 documentation, or if you insist, upgrade to 2.2.4
and then follow the instructions you've been reading.
